text: til'ka l-rusulu faddalna baʿdahum ʿala baʿdin min'hum man kallama l-lahu warafaʿa baʿdahum darajatin waatayna ʿisa ib'na maryama l-bayinati wa-ayyadnahu biruhi l-qudusi walaw shaa l-lahu ma iq'tatala alladhina min baʿdihim min baʿdi ma jaathumu l-bayinatu walakini ikh'talafu famin'hum man amana wamin'hum man kafara walaw shaa l-lahu ma iq'tatalu walakinna l-laha yafʿalu ma yuridu
